body:
FWIW - I've never seen Xrootd take more than a second or two to stop.  I would be very worried if it doesn't finish after 30s: could indicate a real bug!

Sent from my iPhone

> On Oct 25, 2016, at 10:23 AM, Brian Lin notifications@github.com wrote:
> 
> Fair enough: I tried a few iterations of {{check_stop}} timeouts but couldn't find one that worked and figured we weren't checking before so it didn't hurt to continue to not check it. I'll do some work to try and investigate how long it's actually taking for those services to stop.
